home_page.hero_subtitle: Empower yourself with cutting-edge tools to <1>spy on social media</1>, <1>hack devices</1>, reclaim <1>stolen crypto</1>, track locations, and erase digital footprints – all <1>ethically and discreetly</1>, with expert support for total peace of mind.

about_page.header_title: Your Trusted Digital Recovery & Surveillance Experts
about_page.header_description: We are a professional, discreet team specializing in ethical digital access, recovery, and protection services. With over a decade of experience in cybersecurity, blockchain forensics, and remote monitoring, we help you regain control — whether it's recovering stolen cryptocurrency, securing hacked accounts, or protecting loved ones.
about_page.service_spy_hack_title: Spy or hack any device remotely
about_page.service_spy_hack_desc: Remote spy/hack any Android, iPhone, tablet, or computer. View messages, calls, GPS, photos, apps, and keystrokes — no physical access needed.
about_page.service_crypto_recovery_desc: Recover lost Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, and more from fake platforms, phishing, or stolen wallets. Full blockchain tracing and scammer identification.
about_page.service_grade_enhancement_desc: Discreetly access Snapchat, Instagram, WhatsApp, Facebook, and more remotely. Monitor messages, media, and activity in real-time, even if deleted, with full encryption.
about_page.service_credit_boost_desc: Instantly improve credit scores (Equifax, TransUnion, Experian). Load debit/prepaid cards and access full financial logs.
about_page.service_clear_record_desc: Permanently delete criminal records, change university grades, GPAs, and issue new driver licenses/ID cards in official systems.
about_page.service_stop_blackmail_desc: Identify blackmailers, delete compromising material from devices/cloud, and block future threats — full digital protection.
about_page.why_choose_us_discreet: 100% Discreet – No logs, no traces, no third-party access
about_page.why_choose_us_no_physical_access: No Physical Access Needed – Remote setup & execution
about_page.why_choose_us_proven_results: Proven Results – Thousands of successful cases worldwide
about_page.why_choose_us_support: 24/7 Support – Live chat, email, phone in multiple languages
about_page.quote: We don't just recover data — we recover trust.
about_page.cta_description: Our experts are standing by 24/7 to help you recover and secure your digital world.

phone_section.header_description: Complete remote access to any device and private conversations. See every text, call, photo, video, deleted message, and app activity in real time — even if the user hides or erases it. Works on iPhone, Android, tablets, and computers. No physical access needed after setup. Export full logs with timestamps, media, and metadata for proof.
phone_section.feature_messages_desc: Hack/spy WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Telegram, iMessage, and any messaging app — view full conversations, timestamps, contact names, media files, voice notes, and attachments. Export chat threads as PDF or screenshots.
phone_section.feature_calls_desc: Monitor incoming, outgoing, and missed calls with details: numbers, contact names, exact dates/times, durations and call type (voice, video, VoIP). Get alerts for specific contacts.
phone_section.feature_browser_desc: View every website visited on Chrome, Safari, Firefox, or any browser (full URL, title, visit time, duration, frequency). Capture incognito/private mode history and export searchable reports.
phone_section.feature_accounts_desc: Regain control of compromised Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter — change passwords, remove attackers, recover deleted emails/posts, and secure the account permanently.

crypto.header_description: Take back control of money, credit, and digital assets. Recover scammed crypto, boost credit scores, load debit cards, and stop financial blackmail. Full transparency into bank logs, transactions, and hidden accounts.
crypto.feature_crypto_recovery_desc: Recover lost, stolen, or scammed cryptocurrency from wallets (Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT, etc.). Trace blockchain transactions and identify scammer wallets. Success rate tracking included.
crypto.feature_credit_boost_desc: Boost credit scores (Equifax, TransUnion, Experian) by addressing negative items. Load debit/prepaid cards and access full credit reports and transaction histories.
crypto.feature_hidden_chats_desc: Access hidden chats, deleted stories, direct messages, and private albums across major platforms — see conversation history and shared media.
crypto.feature_stop_blackmail_desc: Identify blackmailers, remove compromising material from devices/cloud, block future contact, and erase traces online for full protection and peace of mind.
crypto.feature_driving_records_desc: Pull driving records and access registration details. (Note: follow local laws and use only legal services.)

gps.header_description: Track real-time location of any device with street-level accuracy using GPS, Wi-Fi, and cell towers. View live movement on a map, get geofence alerts, and export complete route history with timestamps and speed data.
gps.subheader_description: Experience how our GPS system keeps you connected to your devices in real time. Click “Try It Now” to activate live tracking instantly or “View Demo” to explore how location updates and alerts appear within the dashboard interface.

tm.header_description: Hear from the people who’ve trusted Trevor Tech to recover what matters most.
tm.testimonial_1_review: Trevor Tech saved my business data after a critical system crash. Their professionalism and speed were unmatched!
tm.testimonial_2_review: Exceptional service! The recovery process was transparent, and I got every single file back safely.
tm.testimonial_3_review: I thought I had lost years of work, but Trevor Tech brought it all back. Highly recommend their team!
tm.testimonial_4_review: Fast, reliable, and friendly support. They kept me updated throughout the process and delivered perfectly.
tm.testimonial_5_review: I can’t thank Trevor Tech enough. My photos and documents were restored with amazing care and precision.
tm.testimonial_6_review: Their team went above and beyond to recover critical files. The process was smooth and stress-free.
tm.testimonial_7_review: Excellent experience! They communicated clearly, worked fast, and handled my data with great care.
tm.testimonial_8_review: I was amazed by how fast they recovered everything. Totally worth it — real professionals!
tm.testimonial_9_review: I’ve recommended Trevor Tech to my colleagues. Their data recovery service is simply outstanding.

fq.header_description: Got questions? We’ve got answers. Here’s everything you need to know about our discreet, powerful, and 100% effective services.
fq.faq_1_question: How long does data recovery take?
fq.faq_1_answer: Data recovery typically takes between 24 to 72 hours, depending on the extent of damage and data volume.
fq.faq_2_answer: Absolutely. We follow strict confidentiality policies and ensure your data is secure and private at all times.
fq.faq_3_question: Do you offer emergency recovery services?
fq.faq_3_answer: Yes, we provide emergency recovery services for critical data loss situations with same-day analysis.
fq.faq_4_question: What types of devices do you recover data from?
fq.faq_4_answer: We recover data from laptops, desktops, SSDs, HDDs, RAID systems, and mobile devices.

ft.brand_description: Your trusted partner in digital recovery, surveillance, and privacy protection.
ft.disclaimer_description: All services are intended for ethical and legal use only. Installing monitoring software on a device you do not own or have proper authorization to monitor may violate local, state, or federal laws. You take full responsibility for determining that you have the right to monitor the device. We shall not be responsible for any misuse.

email1.subject: Urgent: Your Bank Account is at Risk
email1.preview: Immediate action required to secure your account.
email1.body:
Dear Customer,

We detected suspicious activity on your bank account. Please verify your identity immediately by clicking the link below:

[Secure My Account]

Failure to act within 24 hours may result in account suspension.

Best regards,
Bank Security Team

email2.subject: Password Reset Request
email2.preview: You requested a password reset. Act now to secure your account.
email2.body:
Dear User,

We received a request to reset your password. Click the link below to proceed:

[Reset Password]

If you did not request this, please ignore this email, but we recommend securing your account immediately.

Thank you,
Account Services

email3.subject: Congratulations! You're a Prize Winner!
email3.body:
Dear Winner,

You have been selected as the winner of a $1,000,000 prize! To claim your reward, provide your details via the link below:

[Claim Prize]

Hurry, this offer expires in 48 hours!

Best,
Lottery Team

email4.subject: Your PayPal Account Has Been Suspended
email4.preview: Action required to restore your PayPal account access.
email4.body:
Dear User,

Your PayPal account has been temporarily suspended due to unusual activity. Please verify your account by clicking below:

[Verify Account]

Failure to verify within 24 hours will result in permanent suspension.

PayPal Support

email5.subject: Exclusive Crypto Investment Opportunity
email5.preview: Invest now and earn 500% returns in 7 days!
email5.body:
Dear Investor,

Join our exclusive cryptocurrency investment program and earn 500% returns in just 7 days! Click below to get started:

[Invest Now]

Don't miss this limited-time opportunity!

Crypto Opportunity Team
